title: (x) Masters logo - Caslon w/ Swash Alt. {Stephen}
content: Hi all. I wondering if anybody could help me ID this typeface.
author: charmagad

comments.content: Probably something drawn by hand specifically for the logo. You might like [Caslon italic with the swash alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20150228064055/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=22&displayfontid=C.891.0.0&fontRendererText=MASTERS).

Stephen,  
Thanks! I JUST had a friend of mine email me with the same typeface. I guess great minds do think alike. Much obliged.
